document.full_text: fierce fighting spread across abidjan on friday as troops loyal to ivory coast's laurent gbagbo fended off attacks by forces supporting alassane ouattara's rival claim to the presidency.
document.title: fierce fighting spreads in ivory coast showdown
lines_and_colors: fierce fighting spread across abidjan on friday as troops loyal to ivory coast's laurent gbagbo fended off attacks by forces supporting alassane ouattara's rival claim to the presidency.
